title: "Machine Madness"
content:
Welcome to Machine Madness, the ultimate destination for all things dark and mechanical. Our website is dedicated to showcasing a wide variety of wallpapers featuring abstract illustrations of machines that are sure to send shivers down your spine. 

Whether you're a fan of science fiction or just appreciate the beauty of mechanical designs, our collection has something for everyone. From ominous robots to futuristic vehicles, our wallpapers feature intricate details and glowing red lights that will transport you to a world where machines reign supreme.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download in high resolution, making it easy to add a touch of darkness to your desktop or mobile device. So why wait? Browse our collection today and discover the power and beauty of machines like never before!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of a dark and ominous machine, with glowing red lights and mechanical parts."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
